[b]ASPROJECT IS STILL IN BETA[/b]
[center][b]Features![/b] -Great Economy -Great membership benefits -Completionist and max cape -Tutorial island (Can be skipped) -Spirit shields with proper effects -Duel arena -Godwars bosses -Level points -Prestiging -Revamped PvP System -Amazing pking (PVP Style) -Buy 100, sell 100 -All skills are trainable -Pk points and pk point store. -Titles -Storm of armadyl -Gold scrolls -Single players dungeons -Money vault -Dicing -5+/20+ man raids -Tasks -Tab to reply
